if (playerCommand.startsWith("reward") || playerCommand.startsWith("claim")) { if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); yell(" "+ playerName + " has recived 10M for voting!"); //Note - You may c.Wheel +=2; //need to edit the start of yell, not sure as i dont c.lvlPoints +=5; //use your server base/type c.getDH().sendDialogues(60, 945); } else { c.sendMessage("You have not voted yet type ::vote4cash to do so."); } }

Replace your code with that, please read the code too.

place

if (playerCommand.startsWith("reward") || playerCommand.startsWith("claim")) {
                if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {
                c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000);
                                c.Wheel +=2;
                                c.lvlPoints +=5;
                c.getDH().sendDialogues(60, 945);
                } else {
                c.sendMessage("You have not voted yet type ::vote4cash to do so.");
                }
                                        }

directly under this (this includes the bracket)

public void playerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {

that should do it:)
